Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.serverNetwork

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.serverNetwork.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Class Server is the main server class. It registers, unregisters, removes and reconnects clients, it manages the lobbies and starts the games.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      Creates a new Server instance. It also creates a new thread that allows to manually close the server.

  • Method Details

    • serverQuitter

      public void serverQuitter()
      Waits for user input and terminates the server if the word "quit" is received.

    • getLobbies

      public java.util.ArrayList<Lobby> getLobbies()
      Returns the list of lobbies.
      Returns:
      the list of lobbies

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient​(ClientConnection connection)
      Removes a player from the game and removes his nickname from the list of nicknames. If the player was the owner of a lobby not yet filled, it removes his lobby from the list of lobbies and ask all the other players to select another one, otherwise it removes him from the waiting list of the lobby. If the player was the only one left in a multiplayer game, it calls the removeGame(GameController) method. Once all of this is done, it calls the unregisterClient(ClientConnection) method.
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientConnection object to remove

    • unregisterClient

      public void unregisterClient​(ClientConnection connection)
      Closes the socket in the ClientConnection object provided. Removes the connection from the list of active connections and calls the GameController.removeObserver(Observer) method on the associated virtual view. It also updates the index of the current player of the game in case of multiplayer game. Once this is done it removes the mapping in the clientToConnection map.
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientConnection object to unregister

    • getSocketServer

      public ServerConnectionSocket getSocketServer()
      Returns the ServerConnectionSocket object associated with this server.
      Returns:
      the associated ServerConnectionSocket object

    • setTotalPlayers

      public void setTotalPlayers​(int totalPlayers, ClientConnection connection)
      Sets the number of total players for a game. If the number is 1, creates a single player controller and starts the game, otherwise it creates a multiplayer controller and a lobby others can join until the number of total players is reached.
      Parameters:
      totalPlayers - the number of total players
      connection - the ClientConnection object of the player setting the number of total players

    • join

      public void join​(ClientConnection connection, java.lang.String lobbyHost)
      Makes a player join a lobby and notifies all the other players in that lobby that a player has joined. If the lobby is filled, notifies all players that the game will start, calls the GameController.addObserver(Observer) method on their own virtual view and starts the game.
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientConnection object associated with a player
      lobbyHost - the nickname of the lobby host

    • find

      private VirtualView find​(ClientConnection connection, java.util.Map<VirtualView,​ClientConnection> map)
      Returns the VirtualView object associated with a ClientConnection object.
      Parameters:
      connection - the ClientConnection object
      map - the map that associates a connection with its virtual view
      Returns:
      the VirtualView object found

    • reconnectClient

      public void reconnectClient​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientConnection connection) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Reconnects a player to a game. Adds him to the list of active players and the list of active connections in the game controller, creates a new virtual view and notifies all the other players that he has reconnected. Adds the virtual view to the clientToConnection map and calls the GameController.addObserver(Observer) on it. If no active game that contained the player is found, it notifies him.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player reconnecting
      connection - the ClientConnection object associated with the player
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • registerClient

      public void registerClient​(java.lang.String nickname, ClientConnection connection) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Register a player. If the nickname provided is already in use notifies the player and returns, otherwise creates a new VirtualView object, adds it to the clientToConnection map and sends the player all the available lobbies.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      connection - the ClientConnection object associated with the player
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the thread is interrupted

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Asks for the server port and creates a new Server instance, then it launches a new thread that will execute the ServerConnectionSocket.run() method.
      Parameters:
      args - the main args

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame​(GameController gc)
      Removes all clients associated with a game controller and removes the controller from the list of game controllers. Used when a game has ended.
      Parameters:
      gc - the game controller
